synopsis:
=en
A strange four-year-old boy named Kotaro moves into Shimizu Apartment all on his own. He doesn't seem to have any parents or family around.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Everyone on a Sunny Day/Inspirations from Convenience Store Bentos...

synopsis:
Karino figures out why Kotaro talks the way he does: he's copying Tonosaman, his favorite cartoon character from a show that's about to end.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: For the sake of family/Reason for going out

synopsis:
When he sees someone handing out free balloons, Kotaro tries to collect as many as he can. But there's a reason he wants so many balloons.

(Source: Netflix)

Kotaro's friend Kakeru has a maid who takes care of everything for him, so Kotaro decides to show Kakeru how to do things for himself.

(Source: Netflix)

For some reason, Kotaro is very particular about his tissues. He wants expensive, soft ones because they're "sweet." Later, Karino figures out why.

(Source: Netflix)
